item.title: Number of missing in Texas floods drops from nearly 100 to 3 in hard-hit county
item.description: In a statement Saturday, county officials cited "extensive follow-up work among state and local agencies."

item.title: Florida Rep. Joe Casello dies while in office
item.description: Florida Democratic lawmaker Joe Casello has died while in office following a heart attack

item.title: Trump calls those who want Epstein files released 'troublemakers'
item.description: President Donald Trump again lashed out against calls for more information into the Jeffrey Epstein probe, even after he requested the release of gran...

item.title: WATCH: "The Lost Stuffy Project" reunites kids with stuffed animals lost in flooding
item.description: A nonprofit is helping to reunite children with their "lost" stuffed animals following the July 4 floods in Central Texas.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump signs first major federal cryptocurrency bill into law
item.description: The bill outlines regulations aimed at making a specific kind of digital currency called stablecoins more accessible and mainstream.
